        toToml

  Source   Edit

ImStyle is a library that helps you to manage your Dear ImGui application's style. Load the style from a TOML file rather than hard-coding it into your app. Using ImStyle also allows you to change your app's style without compiling it again (since the style is read from a file).

Without ImStyle you need to set the style in your code:

import nimgl/imgui
...
let style = igGetStyle()
style.alpha = 1f
style.windowPadding = ImVec2(x: 4f, y: 4f)
style.windowMenuButtonPosition = ImGuiDir.Left
style.colors[ord Text] = ImVec4(x: 0f, y: 0f, z: 0f, w: 1f) # RGBA
...
Using ImStyle you will only need to create a TOML file (e.i.: style.toml), that will look like:

# ImStyle
alpha = 1 # -> 1.0
windowPadding = [4, 4] # -> ImVec2(x: 4.0, y: 4.0)
windowMenuButtonPosition = "Left"
...
[colors]
Text = "#000000" # or "rgb(0, 0, 0)" or or "rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" or [0, 0, 0, 1]
...
And load it in your code:

import imstyle
...
igGetCurrentContext().style = styleFromToml("style.toml")
...

    ...raises: [ValueError, KeyError, InvalidColor], tags: [].}
Return the style in data.   Source   Edit 
proc niprefsToToml(path: string; ignoreProps: openArray[string] = [];
                   ignoreColors: openArray[string] = []): TomlValueRef {....raises: [
    KeyError, ValueError, InvalidColor, Exception, SyntaxError, NPegException,
    IOError], tags: [RootEffect, ReadIOEffect].}
Reads a niprefs file, get its style using getIgStyle and conver it to TomlValueRef using toToml.   Source   Edit 
proc styleFromToml(node: TomlValueRef; ignoreProps: openArray[string] = [];
                   ignoreColors: openArray[string] = [];
                   colorProc: proc (col: TomlValueRef): ImVec4 = colorToVec4): ImGuiStyle {.
    ...raises: [KeyError, ValueError], tags: [].}
Load ImGuiStyle from node. Properties in ignoreProps are ignored. Colors in ignoreColors are ignored. colorProc is used to convert colors from TomlValueRef to ImVec4.   Source   Edit 
proc styleFromToml(path: string; ignoreProps: openArray[string] = [];
                   ignoreColors: openArray[string] = [];
                   colorProc: proc (col: TomlValueRef): ImVec4 = colorToVec4): ImGuiStyle {.
    ...raises: [KeyError, ValueError, IOError, OSError, Exception],
    tags: [ReadIOEffect, RootEffect, WriteIOEffect].}
Load ImGuiStyle from the toml file at path.   Source   Edit 
proc toToml(style: ImGuiStyle; ignoreProps: openArray[string] = [];
            ignoreColors: openArray[string] = [];
            colorProc: proc (col: ImVec4): TomlValueRef = toTArray): TomlValueRef {.
    ...raises: [KeyError], tags: [].}
Convert style into TomlValueRef. Properties in ignoreProps are ignored. Colors in ignoreColors are ignored. colorProc is used to convert colors from ImVec4 to TomlValueRef.   Source   Edit
